title: Cracking Da Vinci's Code
description: Was Jesus merely human and not divine?Did Jesus and Mary Magdalene marry and have children?Is there a Holy Grail? If so, what is it and where can it be found?Cracking Da Vinci's Code provides the answers to these and other questions that may have troubled youâ€”or readers you know. Authors James L. Garlow and Peter Jones present compelling evidence that Brown's assertions are not only historically inaccurate, but may also contain a hidden agenda.
author: James L. Garlow
